## solveByGaussianElimination() function

Uses Gauss-Jordan elimination with pivoting and backward substitution to solve the linear equation \_Ax=b\_

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function solveByGaussianElimination<S>(A: Matrix<S>, b: Vector<S>): LinearSolution<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  A | <code>Matrix&lt;S&gt;</code> | The matrix \_A\_ in \_Ax=b\_ |
|  b | <code>Vector&lt;S&gt;</code> | The vector \_b\_ in \_Ax=b\_ |

<b>Returns:</b>

`LinearSolution<S>`

The vector \_x\_ in \_Ax=b\_
